90 class PlanningScene : private boost::noncopyable, public std::enable_shared_from_this<PlanningScene>
91 {
92 public:
94  PlanningScene(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
95  const collision_detection::WorldPtr& world = std::make_shared<collision_detection::World>());
96 
99  PlanningScene(const urdf::ModelInterfaceSharedPtr& urdf_model, const srdf::ModelConstSharedPtr& srdf_model,
100  const collision_detection::WorldPtr& world = std::make_shared<collision_detection::World>());

109  {

136  const PlanningSceneConstPtr& getParent() const

138  return parent_;

142  const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& getRobotModel() const
143  {
144  // the kinematic model does not change
145  return robot_model_;
146  }
147 
149  const moveit::core::RobotState& getCurrentState() const
150  {
151  // if we have an updated state, return it; otherwise, return the parent one
152  return robot_state_ ? *robot_state_ : parent_->getCurrentState();
153  }
155  moveit::core::RobotState& getCurrentStateNonConst();
156 
158  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr getCurrentStateUpdated(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& update) const;
159 
166  const std::string& getPlanningFrame() const
167  {
168  // if we have an updated set of transforms, return it; otherwise, return the parent one
169  return scene_transforms_ ? scene_transforms_->getTargetFrame() : parent_->getPlanningFrame();
170  }
171 
173  const moveit::core::Transforms& getTransforms() const
174  {
175  if (scene_transforms_ || !parent_)
176  {
177  return *scene_transforms_;
178  }
179 
180  // if this planning scene is a child of another, and doesn't have its own custom transforms
181  return parent_->getTransforms();
182  }
183 
186  const moveit::core::Transforms& getTransforms();
187 
189  moveit::core::Transforms& getTransformsNonConst();

209  const Eigen::Isometry3d& getFrameTransform(moveit::core::RobotState& state, const std::string& id) const
210  {
211  state.updateLinkTransforms();
212  return getFrameTransform(static_cast<const moveit::core::RobotState&>(state), id);
213  }

481  void checkSelfCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req, collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
482  moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state) const
483  {
484  robot_state.updateCollisionBodyTransforms();
485  checkSelfCollision(req, res, static_cast<const moveit::core::RobotState&>(robot_state), getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
486  }
487 
489  void checkSelfCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req, collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
490  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state) const
491  {
492  // do self-collision checking with the unpadded version of the robot
493  getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkSelfCollision(req, res, robot_state, getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
494  }
495 
498  void checkSelfCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req, collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
499  moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
500  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
501  {
502  robot_state.updateCollisionBodyTransforms();
503  checkSelfCollision(req, res, static_cast<const moveit::core::RobotState&>(robot_state), acm);
504  }
505 
508  void checkSelfCollision(const collision_detection::CollisionRequest& req, collision_detection::CollisionResult& res,
509  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state,
510  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
511  {
512  // do self-collision checking with the unpadded version of the robot
513  getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkSelfCollision(req, res, robot_state, acm);
514  }

992 
993  MOVEIT_STRUCT_FORWARD(CollisionDetector);
994 
995  /* \brief A set of compatible collision detectors */
996  struct CollisionDetector
997  {
998  collision_detection::CollisionDetectorAllocatorPtr alloc_;
999  collision_detection::CollisionEnvPtr cenv_; // never NULL
1000  collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr cenv_const_;
1001 
1002  collision_detection::CollisionEnvPtr cenv_unpadded_;
1003  collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr cenv_unpadded_const_;
1004 
1005  CollisionDetectorConstPtr parent_; // may be NULL
1006 
1007  const collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr& getCollisionEnv() const
1008  {
1009  return cenv_const_ ? cenv_const_ : parent_->getCollisionEnv();
1010  }
1011  const collision_detection::CollisionEnvConstPtr& getCollisionEnvUnpadded() const
1012  {
1013  return cenv_unpadded_const_ ? cenv_unpadded_const_ : parent_->getCollisionEnvUnpadded();
1014  }
1015  void findParent(const PlanningScene& scene);
1016  void copyPadding(const CollisionDetector& src);
1017  };
1018  friend struct CollisionDetector;
1019 
1020  using CollisionDetectorIterator = std::map<std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>::iterator;
1021  using CollisionDetectorConstIterator = std::map<std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr>::const_iterator;
1022 
1023  void allocateCollisionDetectors();
1024  void allocateCollisionDetectors(CollisionDetector& detector);
1025 
1026  std::string name_; // may be empty
1027 
1028  PlanningSceneConstPtr parent_; // Null unless this is a diff scene
1029 
1030  moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr robot_model_; // Never null (may point to same model as parent)
1031 
1032  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr robot_state_; // if NULL use parent's
1033 
1034  // Called when changes are made to attached bodies
1035  moveit::core::AttachedBodyCallback current_state_attached_body_callback_;
1036 
1037  // This variable is not necessarily used by child planning scenes
1038  // This Transforms class is actually a SceneTransforms class
1039  moveit::core::TransformsPtr scene_transforms_; // if NULL use parent's
1040 
1041  collision_detection::WorldPtr world_; // never NULL, never shared with parent/child
1042  collision_detection::WorldConstPtr world_const_; // copy of world_
1043  collision_detection::WorldDiffPtr world_diff_; // NULL unless this is a diff scene
1044  collision_detection::World::ObserverCallbackFn current_world_object_update_callback_;
1045  collision_detection::World::ObserverHandle current_world_object_update_observer_handle_;
1046 
1047  std::map<std::string, CollisionDetectorPtr> collision_; // never empty
1048  CollisionDetectorPtr active_collision_; // copy of one of the entries in collision_. Never NULL.
1049 
1050  collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrixPtr acm_; // if NULL use parent's
1051 
1052  StateFeasibilityFn state_feasibility_;
1053  MotionFeasibilityFn motion_feasibility_;
1054 
1055  std::unique_ptr<ObjectColorMap> object_colors_;
1056 
1057  // a map of object types
1058  std::unique_ptr<ObjectTypeMap> object_types_;
1059 };
1060 } // namespace planning_scene
